alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 8:41PM MDT until July 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BUTTE...NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND EASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 840 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Crow Peak, or 9 miles west of Spearfish, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Spearfish and Crow Peak. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 11. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 206 and 207. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
